channel.title: The best zombie games on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in The best zombie games on Game6r

item.title: Racing N Kill Its Dark Finish The Fight
item.description: The game Zombie Death Part 3 is a story about a guy who found himself alone in a deserted canyon, and now he has to find his way to the base. But there are a lot of zombies around, and you won’t be able to slip through unnoticed. Luckily, he found a fire truck in an abandoned garage and hit the road. Help him break through the crowds of monsters.

item.title: Zombie Typing
item.description: A zombie apocalypse has occurred, and now crowds of the resurrected dead are striving to capture the base of living people. You need to protect it so that the zombies do not even touch your buildings, much less destroy them. Hire soldiers who will go to the zombie base and capture it, and destroy the enemies.
